Package user

Class PaymentVlibre

  • java.lang.Object
    • user.Payment
      • user.PaymentVlibre
  • public class PaymentVlibre
extends Payment
    Extension of abstract class Payment that represents payment regime for Vlibre holders. The general rule is that the first hour has a reduced cost of one euro and that the following hours have the normal price. Moreover, it is possible to use time credit discounts here. Can be generalized for the creation of more expensive bikes that respect this rule.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PaymentVlibre

        public PaymentVlibre​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                     double cost,
                     long credit)
        Initializes Vlibre payment regime
        Parameters:
        start - LocalDateTime of the start of the rental
        cost - Hourly cost for the bike. One for regular bikes, two for electric bikes
        credit - Time credit disposed by the user. Necessary for calculation of rental price and discount.

    • Method Detail

      • getTimeDiscount

        public long getTimeDiscount​(java.time.LocalDateTime end_time)
        Overriden getTimeDiscount method. If the ride is longer than one hour the user is allowed to use its credit minutes as discount. If the time surpassing one hour is higher than the quantity of credits the user has, it automatically discounts all the minutes available. Otherwise, it will just set the ride time to one hour and spend the necessary amount of minute credits to do so.
        Overrides:
        getTimeDiscount in class Payment
        Parameters:
        end_time - LocalDateTime object for the return of the bike.
        Returns:
        Integer with the number of minutes to be used in discount

      • getValue

        public double getValue​(java.time.LocalDateTime end_time)
        Overriden method for getting the correct ride price. The user has a reduced price for the first hour and can use his time credits as discount for the following ones.
        Specified by:
        getValue in class Payment
        Parameters:
        end_time - LocalDateTime object for the return of the bike.
        Returns:
        Double with the price of the bike rental.
